verses.verse: Then <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6908>gathered<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> at <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> we are your <S%H6106>bone<s%> and your <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

"In <S%H1571>times<s%> <S%H8032><s%> <S%H8543><s%> <S%H8543>past,<s%> <S%H8032><s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> when <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was <S%H4428>king,<s%> you [were] the one who <S%H3318>led<s%> out and <S%H935>brought<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to you, 'You shall <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and you shall be <S%H5057>prince<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>'"

So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> at <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with them in <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> and they <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel.<s%>

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> (that is, <S%H2982>Jebus<s%>); and the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> [were] <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H2982>Jebus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> "You shall not <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H2008>here.<s%>" Nevertheless <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3920>captured<s%> the <S%H4686>stronghold<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> (that is, the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>).

Now <S%H1732>David<s%> had <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3605>"Whoever<s%> <S%H5221>strikes<s%> <S%H5221>down<s%> a <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%> <S%H7223>first<s%> shall be <S%H7218>chief<s%> and <S%H8269>commander.<s%>" And <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up <S%H7223>first,<s%> so he <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H7218>chief.<s%>
Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H4679>stronghold;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> it was <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>

And he <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around,<s%> from the <S%H4407>Millo<s%> even to the <S%H5439>surrounding<s%> <S%H5439>area;<s%> and <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H2421>repaired<s%> the <S%H7605>rest<s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>
And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1980>became<s%> <S%H1980>greater<s%> and <S%H1419>greater,<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> [was] with him.

Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> had, who <S%H2388>gave<s%> him <S%H2388>strong<s%> <S%H2388>support<s%> in his <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> <S%H5973>together<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H4427>make<s%> him <S%H4427>king,<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> [constitute] the <S%H4557>list<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> had: <S%H3434>Jashobeam,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a <S%H2453>Hachmonite,<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H7970>thirty;<s%> he <S%H5782>lifted<s%> up his <S%H2595>spear<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> whom he <S%H2491>killed<s%> at <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6471>time.<s%>

And <S%H310>after<s%> him was <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1734>Dodo,<s%> the <S%H266>Ahohite,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> [was] one of the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men.<s%>

He was with <S%H1732>David<s%> at <S%H6450>Pasdammim<s%> when the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> were <S%H622>gathered<s%> together <S%H8033>there<s%> to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> and there was a <S%H2513>plot<s%> of <S%H7704>ground<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H8184>barley;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

And they <S%H3320>took<s%> their <S%H3320>stand<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H2513>plot,<s%> and <S%H5337>defended<s%> it, and <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H5221>down<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines;<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3467>saved<s%> them by a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8668>victory.<s%>

Now <S%H7969>three<s%> of the <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H7218>men<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H6697>rock<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> into the <S%H4631>cave<s%> of <S%H5725>Adullam,<s%> while the <S%H4264>army<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> was <S%H2583>camping<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim.<s%>
And <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H227>then<s%> in the <S%H4686>stronghold,<s%> while the <S%H5333>garrison<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> [was] <S%H227>then<s%> in <S%H1035>Bethlehem.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H183>had<s%> a <S%H183>craving<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>"Oh<s%> that <S%H4310>someone<s%> would <S%H8248>give<s%> me <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%> from the <S%H953>well<s%> of <S%H1035>Bethlehem,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is by the <S%H8179>gate!<s%>"

So the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1234>broke<s%> <S%H1234>through<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and <S%H7579>drew<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> from the <S%H953>well<s%> of <S%H1035>Bethlehem<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [was] by the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> [it] and <S%H935>brought<s%> [it] to <S%H1732>David;<s%> nevertheless <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H8354>drink<s%> it, but <S%H5258>poured<s%> it out to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%>

and he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Be it <S%H2486>far<s%> from me <S%H4480>before<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> that I should <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>this.<s%> Shall I <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> [who went] at the risk of their <S%H5315>lives<s%>? For at the risk of their <S%H5315>lives<s%> they <S%H935>brought<s%> it." Therefore he <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H8354>drink<s%> it. <S%H428>These<s%> <S%H428>things<s%> the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> <S%H6213>did.<s%>

As for <S%H52>Abshai<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> he was <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H7970>thirty,<s%> and he <S%H5782>swung<s%> his <S%H2595>spear<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2491>killed<s%> them; and he had a <S%H8034>name<s%> as well as the <S%H7970>thirty.<s%>

Of the <S%H7969>three<s%> in the <S%H8147>second<s%> [rank] he was the most <S%H3513>honored,<s%> and <S%H1961>became<s%> their <S%H8269>commander;<s%> however, he did not <S%H935>attain<s%> to the [first] <S%H7969>three.<s%>

<S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H6909>Kabzeel,<s%> <S%H7227>mighty<s%> in <S%H6467>deeds,<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H5221>down<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> [sons of] <S%H739>Ariel<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%> He also <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> and <S%H5221>killed<s%> a <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H8432>inside<s%> a <S%H953>pit<s%> on a <S%H7950>snowy<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And he <S%H5221>killed<s%> an <S%H4713>Egyptian,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of [great] <S%H4060>stature<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> tall. Now in the Egyptian's <S%H3027>hand<s%> [was] a <S%H2595>spear<s%> like a weaver's <S%H4500>beam,<s%> but he <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to him with a <S%H7626>club<s%> and <S%H1497>snatched<s%> the <S%H2595>spear<s%> from the Egyptian's <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H2026>killed<s%> him with his own <S%H2595>spear.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> [things] <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> <S%H6213>did,<s%> and had a <S%H8034>name<s%> as well as the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> he was <S%H3513>honored<s%> <S%H4480>among<s%> the <S%H7970>thirty,<s%> but he did not <S%H935>attain<s%> to the <S%H7969>three;<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7760>appointed<s%> him <S%H5921>over<s%> his <S%H4928>guard.<s%>

Now the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> of the <S%H2428>armies<s%> [were] <S%H6214>Asahel<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> <S%H445>Elhanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1734>Dodo<s%> of <S%H1035>Bethlehem,<s%>
<S%H8054>Shammoth<s%> the <S%H2033>Harorite,<s%> <S%H2503>Helez<s%> the <S%H6397>Pelonite,<s%>
<S%H5896>Ira<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6142>Ikkesh<s%> the <S%H8621>Tekoite,<s%> <S%H44>Abiezer<s%> the <S%H6069>Anathothite,<s%>
<S%H5444>Sibbecai<s%> the <S%H2843>Hushathite,<s%> <S%H5866>Ilai<s%> the <S%H266>Ahohite,<s%>
<S%H4121>Maharai<s%> the <S%H5200>Netophathite,<s%> <S%H2466>Heled<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1196>Baanah<s%> the <S%H5200>Netophathite,<s%>
<S%H863>Ithai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7380>Ribai<s%> of <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H6553>Pirathonite,<s%>
<S%H2360>Hurai<s%> of the <S%H5158>brooks<s%> of <S%H1608>Gaash,<s%> <S%H22>Abiel<s%> the <S%H6164>Arbathite,<s%>
<S%H5820>Azmaveth<s%> the <S%H978>Baharumite,<s%> <S%H455>Eliahba<s%> the <S%H8170>Shaalbonite,<s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2044>Hashem<s%> the <S%H1493>Gizonite,<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7681>Shagee<s%> the <S%H2043>Hararite,<s%>
<S%H279>Ahiam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7940>Sacar<s%> the <S%H2043>Hararite,<s%> <S%H465>Eliphal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H9003>Ur,<s%>
<S%H2660>Hepher<s%> the <S%H4382>Mecherathite,<s%> <S%H281>Ahijah<s%> the <S%H6397>Pelonite,<s%>
<S%H2695>Hezro<s%> the Carmelite, <S%H5293>Naarai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H229>Ezbai,<s%>
<S%H3100>Joel<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H5416>Nathan,<s%> <S%H4006>Mibhar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1905>Hagri,<s%>

<S%H6768>Zelek<s%> the <S%H5984>Ammonite,<s%> <S%H5171>Naharai<s%> the <S%H1307>Berothite,<s%> the <S%H3627>armor<s%> <S%H5375>bearer<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah,<s%>
<S%H5896>Ira<s%> the <S%H3505>Ithrite,<s%> <S%H1619>Gareb<s%> the <S%H3505>Ithrite,<s%>
<S%H223>Uriah<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> <S%H2066>Zabad<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H304>Ahlai,<s%>
<S%H5721>Adina<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7877>Shiza<s%> the <S%H7206>Reubenite,<s%> a <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H7206>Reubenites,<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> with him,
<S%H2605>Hanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4601>Maacah<s%> and <S%H3092>Joshaphat<s%> the <S%H4981>Mithnite,<s%>
<S%H5814>Uzzia<s%> the <S%H6254>Ashterathite,<s%> <S%H8091>Shama<s%> and <S%H3262>Jeiel<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2369>Hotham<s%> the <S%H6200>Aroerite,<s%>
<S%H3043>Jediael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8113>Shimri<s%> and <S%H3109>Joha<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> the <S%H8491>Tizite,<s%>
<S%H447>Eliel<s%> the <S%H4233>Mahavite<s%> and <S%H3403>Jeribai<s%> and <S%H3145>Joshaviah,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H493>Elnaam,<s%> and <S%H3495>Ithmah<s%> the <S%H4125>Moabite,<s%>
<S%H447>Eliel<s%> and <S%H5744>Obed<s%> and <S%H3300>Jaasiel<s%> the <S%H4677>Mezobaite.<s%>
